snippet: African countries tightened travel curbs on Thursday in an effort to contain the Ebola outbreak, ignoring World Health Organization warnings that such measures could heighten shortages of food and basic supplies in affected areas....

headline.print_headline: Africa Tightens Ebola Travel Curbs as Affected Countries Face Food Shortages
headline.main: Africa Tightens Ebola Travel Curbs as Affected Countries Face Food Shortages

lead_paragraph: African countries tightened travel curbs on Thursday in an effort to contain the Ebola outbreak, ignoring World Health Organization warnings that such measures could heighten shortages of food and basic supplies in affected areas.
